To run prebuilt binary call java -jar Spacewars.jar in this directory
To build all targets run ant in the root dir.
To run, call ant run

To play, use the following keys:
 W - accelerate
 A - Rotate CCW
 D - Rotate CW
 R - Respawn
 Q - Hyperspace to selected server
 Up - Select previous server
 Down - Select next server
 
Notes:
+ Game will not run without a network connection.
+ Connection issues not caused by program may cause a variety of exceptions to be thrown.
